tab1.text1:
We're a friendly community focused on fun, function and keeping a balance.
          All our settings, mods and plugins are focused around maintaining the idea of ARK's gameplay while removing the painful grind or tedious actions day in and day out.
          
          Any and all Quality of Life features we offer that may alter the way you play the game in any way will need to be worked for and earned. We don't believe in handouts and it makes things that much more rewarding when you achieve them!
          
          We're a server who cares about your game and your fun. Come meet our players and introduce yourself!
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.Gold>- Added this new UI w/ mod WBUI2!
- New Map: Svartalfheim (/servers and /transfer)
- Working Class Module Adjustments

tab2.text1:
XP: 2
Harvest: 3
Taming: 1 (Use Appetizers for quicker/instant Tames)

Daytime Length: 0.5
Nighttime Length: 0.5

Admin Logging: Yes
Gamma: Allowed
Third Person: Allowed

Unlimited Respecs: No
Tamed Dinos per Tribe: 100

Wild Dino Level: 150
Dino Food Drain: 1
Harvest Health: 1

Egg Intervals: 1
Egg Hatceh Speed: 3
Baby Mature Speed: 3
Mating Interval: 1

Crosshair: Enabled
Hardcoremode: Off
Structure Decay: x2
tab2.text2:
Make sure you've connected your in-game character to our website so the system recognizes you in-game! Use Command <TextStyle.Orange>!getconnectcode</> in chat to get a code to paste into your Profile Settings on site!

1. Keep the game enjoyable for others. Remind your fellow survivors about this.
2. Don't leave creatures set to Mating. Disable all creatures when you're finished.
3. Don't block access to public places with buildings, turrets or dinos. Ex: Spawn Points, Obelisks, Caves, etc
4. Clean up after yourself. Don't leave traps and other structures you don't plan to use laying around.
5. No mass land 'claiming'.
6. No Pillar/Foundation Spamming.
7. No Massive Bases (Use Common Sense).
8. Only 1 Tribe Base and Outpost is allowed.

Permabans will be given for:
Any form of racism, homophobia or targeted trash talk
Any form of hacking, cheating or exploiting
